paragraph: Matthew Simmonds, also known as 4mat or 4-Mat, is a British electronic musician, sound designer, and video game composer best known for his chiptunes written in tracker software. He began his career in the demoscene of the early 1990s composing on the Amiga.
L.F.F., as the theme music on Skid Row's cracktro for Lemmings (1991)
